thread.title: Systweak Software Announces Launch of Doctor Disk Cleaner for Mac
thread.title_full: Systweak Software Announces Launch of Doctor Disk Cleaner for Mac - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Systweak Software Announces Launch of Doctor Disk Cleaner for Mac
text:
Systweak Software Announces Launch of Doctor Disk Cleaner for Mac
Doctor Disk Cleaner is an optimization app for Mac devices aimed at boosting up its performance by eliminating junk easily.
Jaipur, India, October 16, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Systweak Software finally announces the launch of its next big product for Mac, Doctor Disk Cleaner – a free Mac optimizer & junk cleaner. It is best suited for users whose Mac systems slow down after a certain period of time.
Doctor Disk Cleaner is the next big thing for Mac devices. Developed by Systweak Software, it aims to speed up and optimize Mac devices as a whole. The memory optimization technique used in this app is as simple as a-b-c for end users, since it's done in not more than a click.
“We wanted to make the whole optimization & cleaning process simple. This is why we provided the option to do it with one click on the home screen itself. Unlike other optimization and cleaning apps, Doctor Disk Cleaner is absolutely free for a limited time,” Quote: d Mr. Shrishail Rana, CEO of Systweak Software.
“If users have a lot of junk and many large files, they may view and clean those with the full disk scan option. This will keep users’ Mac running smoothly and will maintain its overall health,” added Mr. Rana.
The Vice-President of Systweak Software, Mr. Manish Jain believes that this product will boost the overall performance of Mac systems. It provides the ease of viewing all large files and junk within a single window and will fulfil all the basic requirements a Mac user would demand in terms of optimizing their Mac.
Systweak Software, a product based company located in Jaipur, India aims at improving digital lives of users. Its flagship product, Duplicate Photos Fixer Pro is still ruling the photography category of the Mac App Store.
Doctor Disk Cleaner is available for download on the Mac App Store for free.
Visit Website: http://www.doctordiskcleaner.com/
